title: Gooseberry meringue tart
ingredients: ['Pastry', '140g plain flour', '75g cold butter', '1 pinch of salt', '2-3 tablespoons ice-cold water', 'Filling', '1 jar gooseberries in juice', '1/4 teaspoon ground ginger', '3 tablespoons cornflour', '3 egg whites', '1 pinch of salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
